meanings.definition: A romantic or medieval tale or narrative.
meanings.sent1: The children gathered around the fire to listen to the romaunt of knights and dragons.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading romaunts about brave heroes and beautiful maidens.
meanings.sent3: The romaunt of the talking animals made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her romaunt of adventure and love painted vivid pictures in the listeners' minds.
meanings.sent5: The romaunt of the lost kingdom captured the hearts of all who heard it.

meanings.definition: To tell a romantic or medieval tale.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa would romaunt about his adventures as a young sailor.
meanings.sent2: She loved to romaunt to her friends about the magical lands she visited in her dreams.
meanings.sent3: The children begged her to romaunt another story before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: He would romaunt for hours, weaving tales of love and chivalry.
meanings.sent5: The bard would romaunt with such passion that his audience felt transported to another time.
